de.mrapp.android.validation.constraints.text

Class RegexConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.validation.constraints.text.RegexConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constraint<java.lang.CharSequence>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContainsLetterConstraint, ContainsNumberConstraint, ContainsSymbolConstraint

    public class RegexConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constraint<java.lang.CharSequence>
    A constraint, which allows to verify a text in order to check, if it matches a certain regular expression.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegexConstraint(java.util.regex.Pattern regex)
      Creates a new constraint, which allows to verify a text in order to check, if it matches a certain regular expression.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.regex.Pattern getRegex()
      Returns the regular expression, which is used to verify the texts.
      boolean isSatisfied(java.lang.CharSequence value)
      Returns, whether a specific value satisfies the constraint, or not.
      void setRegex(java.util.regex.Pattern regex)
      Sets the regular expression, which should be used to verify the texts.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegexConstraint

        public RegexConstraint(java.util.regex.Pattern regex)
        Creates a new constraint, which allows to verify a text in order to check, if it matches a certain regular expression.
        Parameters:
        regex - The regular expression, which should be used to verify the texts, as an instance of the class Pattern. The regular expression may not be null

        public final void setRegex(java.util.regex.Pattern regex)

      • isSatisfied

        public final boolean isSatisfied(java.lang.CharSequence value)
        Description copied from interface: Constraint
        Returns, whether a specific value satisfies the constraint, or not.
        Specified by:
        isSatisfied in interface Constraint<java.lang.CharSequence>
        Parameters:
        value - The value, which should be verified, as an instance of the generic type Type
        Returns:
        True, if the given value satisfies the constraint, false otherwise
